modName: EROS - Edifying Romanticist Overhaul of Skyrim
summary:
Has life gotten you down again?
Are people annoying the crap out of you?
Is your daily reality a bit too plain and dull?
Do you yearn for a walk through lush forests and rolling hills, hiking along glistening creeks, or
descriptionHtml: We all know gaming is a way to escape reality, but sometimes that escapism is more intensely experienced when it is conveyed by something a little closer to reality itself. So, in the spirit of romanticism - of Caspar David Friedrich, Thoreau, and the like - I give you the Edifying Romanticist Overhaul of Skyrim. It's Skyrim, but without all that competitive, violent, nonsensical, physics defying stuffing. You can almost smell the heath and pines, as you make your way to the rim of the sky.
author: Infinite Polygon
